title: Education and Lifelong Learning in Timor-Leste

questions.question: What is one of the main objectives of Learning Unit 6?
choices: To analyze the political system in Timor-Leste
To recognize the importance of education for women's empowerment
To develop strategies for economic independence
To understand key health issues affecting women in Timor-Leste
questions.answer: To recognize the importance of education for women's empowerment

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT listed as a topic in Learning Unit 6?
choices: Barriers to girls' education in Timor-Leste
Adult literacy and vocational training opportunities

questions.question: What is one of the activities mentioned in Learning Unit 6?
choices: Role-play on discussing sensitive health topics
Design a community awareness campaign for girls' education
Create an advocacy plan for a local women's issue
questions.answer: Design a community awareness campaign for girls' education

questions.question: Which of the following is a required resource for the course?
choices: "Women and the Politics of Gender in Post-Conflict Timor-Leste" by Sara Niner
"The History of Timor-Leste" by John Smith
"Gender Equality in Southeast Asia" by Jane Doe
"Economic Development in Timor-Leste" by Michael Johnson
questions.answer: "Women and the Politics of Gender in Post-Conflict Timor-Leste" by Sara Niner

questions.question: What is one of the suggested items to cover in the course?
choices: The role of the Catholic Church in shaping gender norms
The impact of climate change on women in Timor-Leste
The history of the Portuguese colonization of Timor-Leste
The role of women in the fishing industry
questions.answer: The role of the Catholic Church in shaping gender norms

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT listed as a practical experience or community engagement activity?
choices: Shadow a local female leader for a day
Organize a community event promoting women's rights
Conduct a small-scale needs assessment in participants' communities
Attend a national conference on women's empowerment
questions.answer: Attend a national conference on women's empowerment

questions.question: Which organization is mentioned as an additional resource for the course?
What is the literacy rate for women in Timor-Leste according to the infographic?
What is the primary school enrollment rate for girls in Timor-Leste according to the infographic?
What is the most common reason for girls aged 10-18 dropping out of school in Timor-Leste?
Which foundation runs a scholarship program for girls in Timor-Leste?
What percentage of Alola Foundation scholarship recipients pursue higher education or vocational training?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a cultural barrier to girls' education in Timor-Leste?
choices: Traditional gender roles prioritizing boys' education
Girls expected to help with household chores

questions.question: What is one of the economic factors affecting girls' education in Timor-Leste?
choices: Lack of job opportunities for educated women
Poverty forcing families to choose which children to educate
questions.answer: Poverty forcing families to choose which children to educate

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a safety concern for girls' education in Timor-Leste?
choices: Risk of harassment en route to school
Presence of armed conflicts near schools
questions.answer: Presence of armed conflicts near schools

questions.question: What is SENAI in the context of Timor-Leste's education system?
Which organization runs a Girls' Education program in Timor-Leste?

Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a benefit of educating women in Timor-Leste?
What percentage of tertiary education enrollment in Timor-Leste is comprised of women?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a strategy for expanding mentoring programs in Timor-Leste?
choices: Engaging successful Timorese women as speakers
Implementing mandatory mentoring in all schools
questions.answer: Implementing mandatory mentoring in all schools

questions.question: What is the overall literacy rate in Timor-Leste according to the infographic?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a challenge for adult literacy and vocational training programs in Timor-Leste?
choices: Lack of childcare options for participants
Need for better alignment with job market demands

Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a key feature of the Alola Foundation's scholarship program?
What percentage of girls aged 10-18 drop out of school due to marriage or pregnancy in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a vocational training opportunity for women in Timor-Leste?

Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a benefit of mentoring for girls in Timor-Leste?
choices: Offers guidance on education and career paths
